alert.note: Alert for Panola; Tate (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 7:13PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Tate and northeastern Panola Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 713 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Strayhorn, or 7 miles west of Senatobia, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Senatobia, Coldwater, Como, Barr, Independence, Strayhorn, Looxahoma, Crossroad, McGhee, Sarah, Poagville, New Town, Cypress Corner and Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern Mississippi.
